tag.name: Session Duration Listener
tag.notes:
Based on code written by Leon Korteweg (leonkorteweg.nl)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ySb0BpS_W4
https://www.dropbox.com/s/4i6a8fyhi8enhdr/20230309-session-duration.json?e=1&dl=0

parameter.value:
<script> 
/* Based on code written by Leon Korteweg (leonkorteweg.nl)
 * Modified to work for seconds and set cookie domain by Drew Spencer
 * Excellent cookie scripts borrowed from Peter-Paul Koch (https://www.quirksmode.org/js/cookies.html)
 */
var theDomain = {{Root Domain}}; 
var theCookieName = {{Session Duration Cookie Name}}; 
var theIntervalSeconds = 1; 
var theSessionExpires = theIntervalSeconds * 9; // expire time part of check but cookie does not need to live more than seconds past each check
var theSecondMarkers = [6, 11, 90];

var GTMSessionDuration = function() { 
  this.settings = { secondMarkers: theSecondMarkers, sessionExpires: theSessionExpires }; /* Some settings */
  setInterval( this.checkDuration.bind(this), theIntervalSeconds * 1000 ); /* Check duration every X ms */
};
GTMSessionDuration.prototype.checkDuration = function() {
  if ( document.hidden ) return; /* stop if tab inactive */
  var durationSeconds = this.readCookie( theCookieName ) || 0; /* get last session duration from cookie or start from 0 */
  durationSeconds = parseInt( durationSeconds ); /*  convert to number */
  this.createCookie( theCookieName , durationSeconds + theIntervalSeconds , this.settings.sessionExpires ); /* save session duration + 1 sec */
  if( this.settings.secondMarkers.indexOf( durationSeconds ) !== -1 ) { this.dataLayerPush( durationSeconds ); } /* dataLayer push if in second marker list */
};
GTMSessionDuration.prototype.dataLayerPush = function( durationSeconds ) {
  dataLayer.push({ 'event': 'session_duration', 'session_duration_seconds': durationSeconds });
};
GTMSessionDuration.prototype.createCookie = function(name,value,seconds) {
    var expires = "";
	if (seconds) {
		var date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(seconds*1000));
		var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/; SameSite=None; Secure; domain=." + theDomain;
};
GTMSessionDuration.prototype.readCookie = function(name) {
	var nameEQ = name + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
		if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
	}
	return null;
};
var gtmSessionDuration = new GTMSessionDuration();
</script>
